headline: Bayer’s Roundup Settlement Bid And Oncology Progress Reshape Investment Debate
summary: Bayer (XTRA:BAYN) has proposed a major US Roundup settlement aimed at resolving thousands of lawsuits tied to its glyphosate based herbicide. Several large US law firms representing a significant group of plaintiffs have already raised objections, questioning elements of the proposal and its fairness. The company reported positive final overall survival results from a Phase III trial of a cancer drug, pointing to a potential new option in oncology. Bayer expanded its digital agriculture...
